version_description:
New Features:
• Configurable link line thickness
• Multiple layouts in a single map
• Summary relationships (many to one)
• Angled relationship lines
• Straight relationship lines
• New Import Options
     &nb

New Features:
• Configurable link line thickness
• Multiple layouts in a single map
• Summary relationships (many to one)
• Angled relationship lines
• Straight relationship lines
      • Follow link for mor

New Features:
• Much improved Pencil support for Doodles (iPad Pro)

Tweaks:
• None in this release

Fixes:
• Various bug fixes and performance improvements.
• Fixes an issue with Dropbox upload

New Features:
• None in this version

Tweaks:
• None in this release

Fixes:
• Various bug fixes and performance improvements.
• Fixed iOS9.3 issue when pasting text into a topic
• Fixed crash when dragging the map root topic un

重要注意事项： 本次更新 (v4) 使用新的文件格式 (itmz)，此格式无法使用之前版本的应用程序打开。您需要在所有设备上下载 v4 应用程序，以便打开由此应用程序创建或编辑的导图。

新功能:
• 现已可使用 Markdown 编写主题文本和注释。
• 恢复键盘工具栏（用于定位文本光标）

调整:
• 导图的打开速度更快
• 导图尺寸更小

修复:
• 修复多个漏洞并提升性能。
